column5: Luxury resort style home located on Clear Lake. 3 bedroom plus study, 4.5 bath, with pool in gated community. Located just outside of Houston only a short commute to NRG stadium where Super Bowl LI will be hosted. Minutes from the Kemah Boardwalk, Galveston Island, and much more! Enjoy countless restaurants, exciting night life, shopping, and water activities during your stay! Look no further! This home offers it all!
